faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I earn loyalty points?
faq.a1: You earn points by shopping at partner merchants and scanning QR codes. Points are automatically added to your account.
faq.q2: How can I redeem my points?
faq.a2: You can redeem points for discounts at checkout or exchange them for cashback through your account dashboard.
faq.a3: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data.
faq.q4: How do merchants benefit from this platform?
faq.a4: Merchants can attract new customers, track sales, manage offers, and increase customer retention through our platform.
faq.q5: Can I use the platform on mobile?
faq.a5: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works on all devices including smartphones and tablets.
faq.q6: How does the affiliate program work?
faq.a6: When you refer friends who sign up and make purchases, you earn commissions based on their activity.
